content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'bronze_sadlteam1gen2_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [bronze_sadlteam1gen2_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://bronze@sadlteam1gen2.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stg.cosmos_movies (
	[name] nvarchar(4000),
	[availabilityDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[genre] nvarchar(4000),
	[rating] nvarchar(4000),
	[releaseYear] bigint,
	[runtime] bigint,
	[streamingAvailabilityDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[tier] bigint,
	[title] nvarchar(4000),
	[id] nvarchar(4000),
	[_rid] nvarchar(4000),
	[_self] nvarchar(4000),
	[_etag] nvarchar(4000),
	[_attachments] nvarchar(4000),
	[_ts] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'movies/data_51deafb2-b1f7-4c3e-be9d-324c7f4ddbd8_5f958cc0-9864-4293-861d-de03b0a9a251.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [bronze_sadlteam1gen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM stg.cosmos_movies
GO
